name: Mini Boat Driving Games for Free Water Racing 3D
name_original: Mini Boat Driving Games for Free Water Racing 3D
description:
Get on your ship and sail the craziest boat race of the moment! Be a great captain and win this competition. Fun ahoy!

BEAT YOUR ENEMIES SHIPS
Don´t stop showing your sailing habilities! Try not to crush your boat and leave your rivals far away.

FUN GRAPHICS
If you are brave enough to sail a boat through the open sea, this is your game! Enjoy the wonderful graphics and the beautiful landscapes, but don´t get distracted!

PERFECT AT ANY AGE
The theme as well as the playability of this racing game is adapted to people of any age. Super easy controls!

DYNAMIC LEADERBOARDS
Become the most envied sailor. Do your best at the helm of the ship and beat the world record!

Keep your status and don´t let any ship overtakes you.

Now you have the chance to have the best boat game of 2016! Be fast and don´t miss it!

SOCIAL NETWORKS
◉ Follow us on Twitter: @Oscarminigames
◉ Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
